job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltstronggtat cadence we hire and develop leaders and innovators who want to make an impact on the world of technology ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtcadence is a pivotal leader in electronic design building upon more than years of computational software expertise the company applies its underlying intelligent system design strategy to deliver software hardware and ip that turn design concepts into realityltbrgtltbrgtcadence customers are the worlds most innovative companies delivering extraordinary electronic products from chips to boards to systems for the most dynamic market applications including consumer hyperscale computing g communications automotive aerospace industrial and healthltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for a talented motivated software engineer to work with the rampampd team on developing highperformance software you will be responsible for design implementation and optimization of infrastructure and abstraction layers for running the physical verification software with the focus on performance reliability and distributionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtjob requirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtexcellent programming skill in ccltbrgtltbrgtmust have excellent verbal written and interpersonal communication skills to work with geographically distributed teamltbrgtltbrgtdesire to learn and deliver with highest quality is a mustltbrgtltbrgtknowledge of advanced process and physical verification product especially lvs layout vs schematic are plusesltbrgtltbrgtexperience with scripting languages python andor tcl nice to haveltbrgtltbrgtthe position requires master in computer science or engineering or equivalentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt ltstronggtwere doing work that matters help us solve what others cantltstronggtltstronggt
